mapper.insert: insert into sjb_member(memberId, memberPs, memberName, memberGender, memberPhon, birthY, birthM, birthD, memberEmail, memberAdmin, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw},#{memberName},#{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{birthY},#{birthM},#{birthD}, #{memberEmail}, 0, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberAddr3});
